Package CAMs

Class CampCommitteeMember

java.lang.Object
CAMs.User
CAMs.Student
CAMs.CampCommitteeMember
public class CampCommitteeMember extends CAMs.Student
The class represents a student who serves on a camp committee. It extends the `Student` class, inheriting basic student information and behavior.
Since:
2023-11-25
Version:
3.0
Author:
Jeevika, Mathangi, Teja, Vikaas

  • Constructor Details

    • CampCommitteeMember

      public CampCommitteeMember(String name, String email, CAMs.Schools faculty, List<CAMs.Camp> getRegisteredCamps, List<CAMs.Enquiry> getStudentEnquiries, List<CAMs.Camp> getwithdrawnCamps)
      Constructs a new CampCommitteeMember with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the camp committee member.
      email - The email address of the camp committee member.
      faculty - The school faculty to which the camp committee member belongs.
      getRegisteredCamps - The list of camps the committee member is registered for.
      getStudentEnquiries - The list of student enquiries associated with the committee member.
      getwithdrawnCamps - The list of camps the committee member has withdrawn from.

    • setRegisteredCamps

      public void setRegisteredCamps()
      Sets the registered camps of the camp committee member. Prints "Empty" if the list of old camps is empty; otherwise, prints "Not Empty".

    • isCampMember

      public boolean isCampMember(CAMs.Camp camp)
      Checks if the current user is a member of the specified camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The Camp object to check for membership.
      Returns:
      true if the user is a registered attendee or camp committee member of the specified camp, false otherwise.
